values: <lj-template name="qotd" id="518"></lj-template>Once upon a time; never again.

Ok so here's our submission for this year's Insomnia Film Festival by Apple. If you like it then remember to vote on the 19th!!! (I'll post a link then) In the meantime, enjoy!


<lj-embed id="1" />

There are worse things that could happen. 

Basically in order to get the property insurance, because the people I am hired by for wouldn't sign off on it, I actually had to incorporate my film company. Yeah so Girl On Top Films, this name I worked under for student films and such.... is now, legally, Girl On Top Films, LLC. Oh yay. I mean it's a good thing (limited liability when you are poor is always a cood thing), but now I need to dig up money and accountants and lawyers...on the otherhand it's pretty cool to be in college and have you're own legit company. So yeah, I'm a CEO. 

Yay stress.. I must be off work and such. 

Love,
CEO of Girl On Top Films, LLC

...And with that... Princess has to be put to sleep. :*-(





bye friend and actress.

How well do you know me?

http://www.testriffic.com/friendtest/3169168

Film festival. TONIGHT. in the Bordy @7:30, yo.

Be there. 

Or die a horrible death brought on by spoons and pita pockets. 


Love!

Girls On Top Films

An evening of films made by creative
undergraduate women including Writers, Directors,
DPs, and editors. A 15 minute Q&A with alumni
industry professionals will kick off the event
with winning and semi-finalist films to follow.
Awards will be given for judges and audience choice.
Refreshments will be served.
Submission deadline is February 28th.
Look for future information about drop off points on campus.

Festival will take place in the Bordy on March 30th @ 7:30- 10PM

Ok so here's the deal: Barnes and Noble cut back on hours... hence I was left without a job. In a desperate attempt to save my films for Film II I am selling Mark. makeup. I could just ask you to give me a few bucks.... but this way you get makeup too!!!


Since some of you live some ways away it's easiest for all of us if you go to

Meet Mark!!!

and place your order. When you are about to check out it will ask you for your representative's phone number,

My Number is xxx xxx xxxx

This really really means a lot to me. Not to mention it's not bad makeup and when I say cheap I really mean it, most stuff is $5-7. That's a heck of a lot cheaper than Sephora.

And men out there, it is Valentine's Day soon... it's a reaalllllyyy easy gift!

Please please please help me out, otherwise I'm going to have to take out another loan and that would really suck.

If you need advice on what to get or have any questions just ask away. After all you know my number now... ;-P

Your (Kinda Sorta) Avon Lady,
Lila

THANK YOU!!!!!!

Yup I rock it's kinda true.

Here's to being on Dean's List again! 

;-)

Love.

Ps- Why is the "Cheerful" frog so damn mellow??!

By the way if it looks to you like I haven't written in a reallllllyyyy long while, then it's because you aren't my "friend"... You might be my Friend... but not my "friend"... so firend me here and show some love and I'll hook you up with the beautiness that is my daily hum drum life. 

And sorry for my already "friends" who this is boring to death...

Much love and all that.
The Ultimate Personality Test!!! Tis pretty accurate....A lota questions though.
Please do this!!! It's spiffy!    Thanks! I'll update later I promise...

BECAUSE YOU HAVEN'T BEEN FRIENDED! Yup if my LJ is new to you chances are you are missing all the juicy gossip and wonder that is my life... for me to clue you in you have to let me know you want to be friended.... I've written oodles of entries and I wouldn't want you to miss out. So peace,love, happiness and all that. Got to go be like a tree and get the hell out of here.

Love!

Please place all luggage in the overhead compartments

 

and then let me know what you think....

 

Love.

If you read this, even if we do not speak often, comment with one memory of me.
It can be anything you want, good or bad.
Just as long as it happened.

Then post this on your livejournal to see what other people remember about you...
Yours truly is [finally] an official Film Major (in addition to my Playwrighting Major!!) @ Emerson College

Btw.... Don't I look like so Carrie here? lol I just played with contrast and so on...

 

Now for the Highlights of my day...

 

Yeah I know I'm great.... muah!

Love Ya.

What's Your High School Stereotype?
created with QuizFarm.com

1. Grab the nearest book.
2. Open the book to page 123.
3. Find the fifth sentence.
4. Post the text of the sentence in your journal along with these instructions.
5. Don't search around and look for the "coolest" book you can find. Do what's actually next to you.

"At home each boy had pictured the Lisbon girls amid the stock scenery of our impoverished imaginations-- cavorting in the surf or playfully fleeing at the ice- skating rink, dangling ski-hat pom-poms like ripe fruit before our faces."
~The Virgin Suicides

staying up late is love
brought to you by the isLove Generator
      
writing is love
brought to you by the isLove Generator

Sorry I have to do this, I really didn't want to... but now I must ask you be my friend before I can allow you to read... It isn't that I'm hiding anything or whatnot... but people don't seem to realize that if I didn't tell you about my LJ there was most likely a reason... and quite bluntly some people just don't get it... so it used to be that half my entries were locked and now they all have to be... tis the life of a writer... I love you all and I hope you know that... Comment and most likely I can let you in my life...
